text: Hi hammad, nice to meet you! Can you please elaborate a bit more what you would define as "package"? Are you talking about themes and other assets, or maybe even apps?

"...the only choice that looks left to me is to create a products custom object on top of the existing products and quotes object." That's what I had to do too. It would be way cooler if we could associate Products with Customer Objects - if you find a way (or I do), please post back - thanks!
